description:
Chup and friends leave Tutti-Frutti via the Transcontinental Railroad. Their destination is the dark skies of Metrufflis. Their goal is to serve just “desserts” for Sultan Vinegar. The friends’ train ride unexpectedly reveals a surprise connection between Chup and mysterious swordsman Velouté.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: チャップ, 新天地へ
